snippet: Amar'e Stoudemire of the Knicks, grieving after his brother was killed in a car accident, will miss three more games. He plans to return to the team on Monday.
abstract: Amar'e Stoudemire of the Knicks, grieving after his brother was killed in a car accident, will miss three more games. He plans to return to the team on Monday.

headline.main: Stoudemire to Miss Three More Games
